resources.string: You have to be connected to internet !!!
Submit your score for your friends to see your progress and to appear in the world top
Submitting is not permanent! You can submit your score whenever you want !
Well done challenge: 15 points\nRejected challenge: -5 points\nSent challenge: 1 point

WORLD CHALLENGE is a contest where everybody who participates has to do a given challenge. If you participate, you will be able to vote for your favourite photos(only one time each), including yourself. At the end of the contest, every participant will receive a bonus, equal to the number of votes he got. Furthermore, the first three places will receive more bonus points depending on the number of competitors.
Every 100 points will bring you 1 level point\nYour app\'s color will change based on your level points (every 30 levels)
You are not in the Top 100

Neither text messages, nor images that promote inappropriate things are strictly prohibited and NOT accepted. You have to agree that you will NOT USE any of the following content:
-sexual explicit content
-child endangerment
-violence, hate or harassment
-sensitive events
-gambling
-any illegal activities
Are you sure you want to delete your account ?
